fields.Name of Venue/Sponsor: Visual Arts Center College of Arts and Sciences, Visual Arts Center
fields.Venue / Sponsor Location (City, State, C: Visual Arts Center, Boise State University, Boise, ID
fields.Description/Abstract: Curatorial project sponsored by an Arts and Humanities Research Grant 2010-2011 from the College of Arts and Sciences. Research included studio visits with artists and curatorial research trips to New York, NY, Seattle, WA and Olympia, WA in April 2011.  Exhibition included the work of ten paper artists from throughout the country utilizing various traditional and contemporary paper cutting techniques.
